name: Ax Me No Questions Trivia Game | Vocabulary | 10 Questions

questions.text: Each answer is a word that contains the word 'ax.' Deadly spores?
questions.explanation:
anthrax.

	I hope whoever is sending anthrax through the mail dies of the inhalation form him or herself (or themselves).

questions.text: Each answer is a word that contains the word 'ax.' Stuffin' critters?
questions.explanation:
taxidermy.

	I believe this was a hobby of Norman Bates in the movie 'Psycho'.

questions.text: Each answer is a word that contains the word 'ax.' Beauty product mogul?
questions.explanation:
Max Factor.

	He helped movie stars look gorgeous in Hollywood's glory days.

questions.text: Each answer is a word that contains the word 'ax.' Agent 99's partner on a 60s TV show?
questions.explanation:
Maxwell Smart & Max Smart.

	Sorry about that, Chief!

questions.text: Each answer is a word that contains the word 'ax.' Rule of conduct?
questions.explanation:
maxim & axiom.

	Maxim is also the name of the hero in the book 'Rebecca'.

questions.text: Each answer is a word that contains the word 'ax.' A TV show AND a vehicle or form of transportation?
questions.explanation:
Taxi.

	This show was a vehicle--get it?--for many fine actors including Judd Hirsch, Danny DeVito, Andy Kaufman, Carol Kane, and Christopher Lloyd.

questions.text: Each answer is a word that contains the word 'ax.' Straw-colored?
questions.explanation:
flaxen.

	I think of 'flaxen' as a fairytale word--flaxen hair, ruby lips, and so on.

questions.text: Each answer is a word that contains the word 'ax.' Short for facsimile?
questions.explanation:
fax.

	Fax machines seem less necessary now that we have email.

questions.text: Each answer is a word that contains the word 'ax.' Branford Marsalis is one.
questions.explanation:
saxophonist.

	I've also seen the word 'saxist' in music criticism.

questions.text: Each answer is a word that contains the word 'ax.' None of your _______!
questions.explanation:
beeswax.

	I think it's amazing how bees construct honeycombs--making all those perfect little hexagonal honey compartments out of wax that they make in their own bodies.
